name: TuberculosisTestsForMycobacteriumTuberculosisByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium tuberculosis by Culture and Identification Method)
description: No Mycobacterium tuberculosis organism specific culture codes found
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium tuberculosis in culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Mycobacterium tuberculosis isolate / culture;  LOINC search: "Mycobacterium tuberculosis (culture or isolate) -avium -leprae -sp  -preliminary -device -dialysis -panel -interpretation -complex"),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
